title: Youre Better Off Alone
lyrics:
I don't care for the confusion
When the one you love just goes away
You exchange a lie for a feelin'
And you are left kneeling when they go away
And you feel like dyin' because that feeling won't go away

And you can't run away from yourself, so there's nowhere you can go

You're better off alone



I don't care for the sorrow

When the one you love just doesn't call

And given time and peace of mind

You yourself won't care, and all



And all that something means nothing at all

And you can't run away from yourself, so there's nowhere you can go

You're better off alone

You're better off alone

You're better off alone
